column4: Are there currently any known issues with ppa.launchpad.net? I'm seeing some 404's on an update
PPAs aren't gauranteed to exist forever. Do you see the packages listed on the PPA page for that software?
Aware of that, I was asking as there were multiple 404's that were fine earlier, wondering if there may be a systems issue I wasnt aware of :)
intlkleinblue: Must be going through some work, thats one responding with the file and one missing now :) I'll give it a while and if it persists, see if its been reported. Thanks: )
